data.client_settings: This works on any platform. (Discord Canary 0.0.163, Discord Stable)
data.short_description: If you can't use an emoji, get the ID of it and follow the GIF from there and it will work.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get an emoji that you can't use because it's not global - get the ID of it - put in chat what I did in the GIF - it should work
